Text:
Extended interview with Julian Assange:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6072506

Thanks for uploading this documentary. It's a must watch. I recommend it to everyone.

Can anyone please tell me where I can find English subtitles for this documentary?

A big cheers to you Mr Brush for yet another excellent upload !  
All good thoughtful TV as a perfect antidote to the usual Hollywood type dross so often clogging up the data streams.
BasilBrush for President !!!
